public void assessSituation(DriverEvent event)

checkWayPoint

protected boolean checkWayPoint(IVehicle vehicle,
                                IWayPoint waypoint)
Check if a junction way point has already been seen Do not use this for other way points than junction way points checks if a way point is important for this lane Only be interested in junction way points that lie on the current lane.

Parameters:
vehicle - The vehicle for having the lanes
waypoint - The waypoint to check
